articles.title: Watch: Ram Charan heads back to Hyderabad ahead of Telangana Elections - India Today
articles.description: Ram Charan is all set to participate in the Telangana Legislative Assembly Elections. He returned to Hyderabad from Mysore, where he was working on his new film 'Game Changer'.
articles.content: Ram Charan is all set to cast his vote during the upcoming Telangana Legislative Assembly Elections, which is due to November 30. The actor was in Mysore today, November 29, and headed back to Telang… [+1242 chars]
